name: Faudel
description: '''Faudel Belloua''' ({{langx|ar|فُضيل بيلوى}}; born June 6, 1978) is a French [[raï]] singer and actor of Algerian descent. He released studio albums, notably ''[[Baïda (Faudel album)|Baïda]]'', ''[[Samra (album)|Samra]]'', ''Un Autre Soleil'' and ''Mundial Corrida'' and the live album ''[[1,2,3 Soleils]]'' jointly with [[Khaled (musician)|Khaled]] and [[Rachid Taha]].
